dc:description: The Japan Foundation London, Lion Court, 25 Procter Street, Holborn, London, WC1V 6NY, UNITED KINGDOM
(1)現在、仮事務所につき、図書館業務は停止させて頂いております。
(2)仮事務所の間、一部の書籍について正会員への貸出サービスを行っております。詳細はウェブサイト(http://www.jpf.org.uk)をご覧ください。
(3)現在、閲覧スペースがないため、閲覧会員へのサービスは休止しております。
会員:図書館の会員には、正会員と閲覧会員の二種類があります。会員資格や貸出規定などの詳細はウェブサイト(http://www.jpf.org.uk)をご覧ください。
(1) Our library is still closed due to our relocation to a temporary office.
(2)As of April 2015, the book loan service for Full Members has been resumed. Please check the details on our website: http://www.jpf.org.uk
(3) Unlike the previous library there is no space for a reference area, so we are unable to receive visitors to our office without prior appointment for receiving materials.
Membership:There are two kinds of membership: full membership and reference membership. Please see our website for further details.
ILL-Address: Lion Court, 25 Procter Street, Holborn, London, WC1V 6NY, UNITED KINGDOM
